slides.caption: Your Data Network and Cybersecurity Guaranteed
slides.description: We protect your data network with the latest cybersecurity technologies.

slides.caption: Cloud Security
slides.description: Secure your data in the cloud with our advanced solutions.

slides.caption: Data Protection
slides.description: Keep your data private and secure with our solutions.

dataImg.paragraph1: Humans have caused numerous environmental problems, becoming one of the worst threats to the planet. We are at a crossroads where, if we do not reverse environmental damage, we are heading towards a negative slope that could lead to the extinction of life on Earth.
dataImg.paragraph2: We want to actively participate in the solution, contributing our grain of sand amidst this crisis that we are leaving to future generations. We want to highlight the importance of technology, using it rationally and sustainably to minimize, and even reverse, environmental impacts.
dataImg.paragraph3: Before applying any technology, it is crucial to consider its environmental impact. This conscious and rational reflection is the essence of our organization, Technology with Conscience (TcC).

features.description: Discover how we can help you transform your business with our advanced technological solutions.

items.name: Innovative Solutions
items.description: We bring cutting-edge technology to solve your toughest challenges.

items.name: Custom Development
items.description: Tailored software solutions designed to meet your unique needs.

items.name: Data Analysis
items.description: Unlock the power of your data with our advanced analytical tools.

items.name: Efficient Processes
items.description: Streamline your operations with technology that saves you time.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Promote the use of various technologies applied by humans in all their daily tasks, without losing sight of the importance that life, nature, and the environment mean for their existence.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: By 2030, TcC should become the most innovative private organization promoting the responsible use of various technologies in the country, fostering national wealth and talent, and imparting free knowledge with zero dependencies, through the adoption and use of software applications in the development processes of our people.

projectCard.description: Check out some of our latest web development and mobile app projects.

projects.description: A modern e-commerce website with a sleek and responsive design.

projects.title: Project Two

quotes.title: Get a Quote for Your Idea
quotes.description: Do you have an idea in mind? We help you bring it to life. Contact us to get a quote for your project.

services.description1: As a comprehensive solutions provider, Tecnología con Conciencia offers services ranging from systems design to multimedia projects, data communications, IT infrastructure, and cybersecurity, with proven experience in government sectors, public entities, and businesses. With our own technical team, you can entrust us with the development, implementation, and maintenance of your network projects.
services.description2: We have been working on several IoT solutions and artificial intelligence technology projects in recent years.

servicesText.description1: As a comprehensive solutions provider, Technology with Conscience offers services ranging from system design to multimedia projects, data communications, IT infrastructure, and cybersecurity, with proven experience in government sectors, public entities, and companies. With our own technical team, you can entrust us with the development, implementation, and maintenance of your network projects.
servicesText.description2: We have been working on several IoT solution projects and artificial intelligence technologies in recent years.

aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Our Company
aboutPage.description: We are a software development company dedicated to providing innovative and customized technological solutions. We specialize in the development of web and mobile applications, offering consulting and technical support services to help our clients achieve their business goals.

principlesPage.innovationDescription: We believe in the power of innovation and the use of information and communication technologies to drive progress and create positive change.
principlesPage.communityDescription: We are committed to community work and building a thriving tech community, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing.

approachPage.openSourceDescription: Open source software and the GNU philosophy are at the heart of our operations. We believe in collaborative knowledge sharing and the use of open tools as a fundamental base while employing other tools as necessary.
approachPage.platformDescription: We design and develop computing platforms that benefit and enhance the development processes of the community.
approachPage.technologyDescription: We develop and promote the adoption of technological applications in various areas of human development, such as communications, clean energy, and organic foods.
approachPage.agriculturalDescription: We conduct research and promote the adoption of technology in the agricultural sector.

formContact.description: Feel free to reach out to us through any of the following methods.

contactSection.contactFormDescription: Fill out the form so we can get in touch with you.
contactSection.socialMediaDescription: Follow us on our social media to stay updated with our latest news.

imgData.title: Transforming Ideas into Innovative Solutions
imgData.description: At Technology with Awareness, we specialize in providing cutting-edge software solutions that help our clients achieve their business goals. With years of experience and a team of qualified professionals, we are committed to delivering exceptional service and fostering innovation.
